video.title: Art & Music
video.synopsis: Baby First presents the world of artistic expression in ways little ones can enjoy, including lessons on colors, shapes and famous works of art.

episodes.synopsis: Join Bonnie Bear as she listens to the sounds of the beach; watch a heartwarming puppet show in which a boy finds his friend; and much more.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Watch artistic creations of musical instruments such as the saxophone and guitar; play a game of connect-the-dots; and much more.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Join Bonnie Bear as she listens to sounds coming from a music class; artists create a zoo made entirely of clay; and much more.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Go on a delightful journey as an artist creates sand drawings; shadow puppets tell the story of a rescued cat; and other adventures.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Watch as an artist builds a playground out of molding clay; Bonnie Bear listens for sounds in the yard; and much more.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Observe artistic representations of healthy fruits and vegetables like a carrot and an apple; Bonnie Bear listens to lots of street sounds; and more.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Look for a sweet treat while playing connect-the-dots; take a trip to the kitchen with Bonnie Bear; and enjoy artistic expressions with Sandman.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: This block features a portrait of a glowing candle; a lively beach scene made entirely of clay; and much more.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Bonnie Bear takes a trip to the farm; a clay picnic comes to life; and a beautiful portrait of a father and son is created.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Watch a shadow story about an adorable baby elephant; take a trip to the jungle with Bonnie Bear; and play connect-the-dots.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: An artist creates a portrait of a picnic; a goldfish art project comes to life; and Bonnie Bear visits a concert hall.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Meet Petey the Paintbrush; watch a beautiful sand drawing of a ferris wheel comes to life; and much more.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Listen for sounds in the garden with Bonnie Bear; enjoy a beautiful shadow puppet show of a dolphin balancing a ball; and much more.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Join a talented sculptor as he creates a flying kite scene made of clay; watch as a tree is created using various art techniques; and much more.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Meet Li'l Vinnie as he paints masterpieces; play connect-the-dots; and help Bonnie Bear listen to all the sounds of nighttime.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Watch as the Sandman creates a drawing of a parrot; Li'l Vinnie paints Bar Manet; and an artist creates a beautiful swan.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: An artist creates a snowy scene made entirely of clay; Bonnie Bear listens to the sounds of the zoo; and much more.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Join the shadow puppets as they tell a story about a boy and his dog; watch Li'l Vinnie re-create a famous work of art; and much more.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Play connect-the-dots to reveal an aquatic creature; Bonnie Bear listens for sounds on a farm; and Li'l Vinnie re-creates a work by Vincent Van Gogh.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Join your child in observing children at a play center; Li'l Vinnie re-creates a Renoir piece; and an artist creates a horse art project.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: The shadow puppets are back to tell a story of a rescued giraffe; a sand drawing of a peacock comes to life; and much more.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Li'l Vinnie re-creates Leonardo da Vinci's Mona Lisa; an art project features a dog; and watch a puppet show of an animal story.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Watch as a beautiful portrait of the moon is drawn; kids play together in the backyard; and Bonnie Bear listens for the sounds of a movie theater.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Petey the Paintbrush introduces the color blue; Bonnie Bear takes a trip to the desert; and a sculptor creates a farm scene out of clay.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Little ones can have fun making art in the shape of a baby bottle, learning about colors with Petey the Paintbrush and sculpting figures out of clay.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Watch as a sand drawing of a turtle is created; Petey the Paintbrush introduces the color red; and much more.
episodes.title: Episode 26
